description.zh-cn: 韩国保守派政治人物与前检察官，曾任第20任大韩民国总统。后因宣布戒严引发政治危机，被国会弹劾并通过，成为继朴槿惠后第二位被弹劾下台的韩国总统。
description.en: A South Korean conservative politician and former prosecutor who served as the 20th President of South Korea. He was later impeached and removed from office after declaring martial law, becoming the second South Korean president to be impeached, following Park Geun-hye.

description.zh-cn: 韩国企业家，尹锡悦的妻子。
description.en: South Korean businesswoman, wife of Yoon Suk Yeol.

description.zh-cn: 韩国经济学家，尹锡悦的父亲。
description.en: South Korean economist, father of Yoon Suk Yeol.

description.zh-cn: 韩国第19任总统，尹锡悦的前任。
description.en: 19th President of South Korea, predecessor of Yoon Suk Yeol.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治人物，共同民主党党员，在2022年总统选举中是尹锡悦的主要对手。
description.en: South Korean politician, member of the Democratic Party, and main opponent of Yoon Suk Yeol in the 2022 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 韩国第18任总统，因崔顺实干政丑闻被弹劾下台，后被尹锡悦领导的检察团队调查并拘留。
description.en: 18th President of South Korea, impeached and removed from office due to the Choi Soon-sil scandal, later investigated and detained by a prosecution team led by Yoon Suk Yeol.

description.zh-cn: 韩国前总统，军事独裁者，因镇压光州民主化运动而备受争议。
description.en: Former President of South Korea and military dictator, controversial for his suppression of the Gwangju Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治人物，曾任法务部长，与时任检察总长的尹锡悦发生激烈冲突。
description.en: South Korean politician who served as Minister of Justice and had intense conflicts with then-Prosecutor General Yoon Suk Yeol.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治人物，曾任法务部长，因涉嫌以权谋私而受到尹锡悦领导的检方调查。
description.en: South Korean politician who served as Minister of Justice and was investigated by the prosecution led by Yoon Suk Yeol on suspicion of abuse of power.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治人物，在2022年总统选举中与尹锡悦整合，成为单一候选人。
description.en: South Korean politician who merged his campaign with Yoon Suk Yeol to form a single candidacy in the 2022 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国举行的第20届总统选举，尹锡悦以微弱优势击败李在明当选。
description.en: The 20th presidential election held in South Korea, where Yoon Suk Yeol was elected after defeating Lee Jae-myung by a narrow margin.

description.zh-cn: 2024年12月3日，时任韩国总统尹锡悦宣布的紧急戒严令。该戒严令在数小时后被国会决议解除，并直接导致了对尹锡悦的弹劾。
description.en: An emergency martial law declared by then-President of South Korea Yoon Suk Yeol on December 3, 2024. It was lifted by a National Assembly resolution a few hours later and directly led to Yoon's impeachment.

description.zh-cn: 针对韩国总统尹锡悦宣布戒严而发起的弹劾案。国会于2024年12月14日通过弹劾动议，宪法法院于2025年4月4日裁定弹劾成立，尹锡悦被罢免。
description.en: The impeachment case against South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol following his declaration of martial law. The National Assembly passed the impeachment motion on December 14, 2024, and the Constitutional Court upheld the impeachment on April 4, 2025, removing Yoon from office.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国的最高立法机关。
description.en: The supreme legislative body of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国的宪法法院，负责审理弹劾案等宪法争议。
description.en: The constitutional court of the Republic of Korea, responsible for ruling on constitutional disputes such as impeachment cases.

description.zh-cn: 2016年爆发的韩国政治丑闻，导致时任总统朴槿惠被弹劾。尹锡悦在此案中担任调查组组长。
description.en: A political scandal in South Korea that broke out in 2016, leading to the impeachment of then-President Park Geun-hye. Yoon Suk Yeol served as the head of the investigation team in this case.

description.zh-cn: 韩国的主要保守派政党，尹锡悦曾作为该党候选人当选总统。
description.en: A major conservative political party in South Korea. Yoon Suk Yeol was elected president as its candidate.

description.zh-cn: 韩国著名大学，尹锡悦的母校。
description.en: A prestigious university in South Korea, the alma mater of Yoon Suk Yeol.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国的国家元首和政府首脑。
description.en: The head of state and head of government of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 韩国检察机关的最高职位。
description.en: The highest position in the South Korean prosecution service.

description.zh-cn: 韩国的法院之一，审理了尹锡悦内乱案并签发了逮捕令。
description.en: One of the courts in South Korea, which tried Yoon Suk Yeol's sedition case and issued arrest warrants.

description.zh-cn: 韩国司法机关因戒严事件对时任及前任总统尹锡悦采取的逮捕行动。尹锡悦于2025年1月15日首次被捕，成为韩国宪政史上首位被捕的现任总统。后于同年7月10日再次被捕。
description.en: Arrest actions taken by South Korean judicial authorities against then and former President Yoon Suk Yeol in connection with the martial law incident. Yoon was first arrested on January 15, 2025, becoming the first sitting president in South Korean constitutional history to be arrested. He was arrested again on July 10 of the same year.

description.zh-cn: 韩国第17任总统，后因贪腐等罪名被尹锡悦领导的检方调查并起诉。
description.en: 17th President of South Korea, later investigated and prosecuted for corruption and other charges by the prosecution team led by Yoon Suk Yeol.

description.zh-cn: 美国第46任总统。
description.en: 46th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 日本第100、101任内阁总理大臣。
description.en: 100th and 101st Prime Minister of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家。尹锡悦政府致力于改善与日本的关系。
description.en: An East Asian country. The Yoon Suk Yeol administration was committed to improving relations with Japan.

description.zh-cn: 尹锡悦于2012年3月11日与金建希结婚。
description.en: Yoon Suk Yeol married Kim Keon-hee on March 11, 2012.

description.zh-cn: 尹锡悦是尹起重的儿子。
description.en: Yoon Suk Yeol is the son of Yoon Ki-joong.

degree.en: Bachelor of Laws, Master of Laws

description.zh-cn: 尹锡悦于1979年考入首尔大学法律系，后获得法学学士和硕士学位。
description.en: Yoon Suk Yeol entered the law department of Seoul National University in 1979 and later obtained bachelor's and master's degrees in law.

description.zh-cn: 尹锡悦于2021年7月加入国民力量党，并作为该党候选人赢得总统选举。他于2025年5月17日宣布退党。
description.en: Yoon Suk Yeol joined the People Power Party in July 2021 and won the presidential election as its candidate. He announced his departure from the party on May 17, 2025.

description.zh-cn: 尹锡悦于2022年5月10日就任韩国第20任总统，后因弹劾案于2024年12月14日被停职，2025年4月4日被罢免。
description.en: Yoon Suk Yeol was inaugurated as the 20th President of South Korea on May 10, 2022. He was suspended from office on December 14, 2024, due to impeachment, and was officially removed on April 4, 2025.

position.zh-cn: 第43任大韩民国检察总长

description.zh-cn: 在文在寅总统任内，尹锡悦被任命为第43任检察总长。
description.en: During President Moon Jae-in's administration, Yoon Suk Yeol was appointed as the 43rd Prosecutor General.

description.zh-cn: 时任总统文在寅任命尹锡悦出任检察总长。
description.en: Then-President Moon Jae-in appointed Yoon Suk Yeol as Prosecutor General.

description.zh-cn: 在2022年大韩民国总统选举中，尹锡悦以0.73%的微弱优势击败对手李在明。
description.en: In the 2022 South Korean presidential election, Yoon Suk Yeol defeated his opponent Lee Jae-myung by a narrow margin of 0.73%.

description.zh-cn: 在崔顺实干政丑闻调查中，时任调查组组长的尹锡悦完成了对前总统朴槿惠的拘留工作。
description.en: During the investigation of the Choi Soon-sil scandal, Yoon Suk Yeol, then head of the investigation team, carried out the detention of former President Park Geun-hye.

description.zh-cn: 在担任首尔中央地方检察厅检察长期间，尹锡悦完成了对前总统李明博的拘留起诉。
description.en: While serving as the chief of the Seoul Central District Prosecutors' Office, Yoon Suk Yeol completed the detention and prosecution of former President Lee Myung-bak.

description.zh-cn: 时任检察总长尹锡悦对卷入丑闻的法务部长曹国展开调查，导致曹国辞职。
description.en: Then-Prosecutor General Yoon Suk Yeol launched an investigation into Justice Minister Cho Kuk, who was embroiled in a scandal, leading to Cho's resignation.

description.zh-cn: 时任法务部长秋美爱因与尹锡悦在多项调查上存在矛盾，下令暂停其检察总长职务。
description.en: Then-Minister of Justice Choo Mi-ae suspended Yoon Suk Yeol from his duties as Prosecutor General due to conflicts over several investigations.

description.zh-cn: 时任总统尹锡悦于2024年12月3日晚间宣布全国进入紧急戒严状态。
description.en: Then-President Yoon Suk Yeol declared a state of emergency martial law nationwide on the evening of December 3, 2024.

description.zh-cn: 韩国国会紧急召开会议，投票通过决议，要求解除尹锡悦总统宣布的戒严令。
description.en: The South Korean National Assembly held an emergency session and voted to pass a resolution demanding the lifting of the martial law declared by President Yoon Suk Yeol.

description.zh-cn: 韩国国会以204票赞成通过了针对总统尹锡悦的弹劾动议案。
description.en: The South Korean National Assembly passed the impeachment motion against President Yoon Suk Yeol with 204 votes in favor.

description.zh-cn: 弹劾案的通过导致尹锡悦被立即停职，并在宪法法院裁决后被正式罢免总统职位。
description.en: The passage of the impeachment motion led to Yoon Suk Yeol's immediate suspension from office, and he was formally removed from the presidency after the Constitutional Court's ruling.

description.zh-cn: 韩国宪法法院以8比0一致裁定弹劾成立，尹锡悦总统职务被解除。
description.en: The Constitutional Court of Korea unanimously ruled 8-0 to uphold the impeachment, removing Yoon Suk Yeol from the presidency.

description.zh-cn: 首尔中央地方法院因内乱案等相关调查，对尹锡悦发出了逮捕令。
description.en: The Seoul Central District Court issued an arrest warrant for Yoon Suk Yeol in connection with investigations into sedition and other matters.

description.zh-cn: 尹锡悦分别于2025年1月15日和7月10日被捕，成为韩国宪政史上首位在任期间及卸任后被多次逮捕的总统。
description.en: Yoon Suk Yeol was arrested on January 15 and July 10, 2025, becoming the first president in South Korean constitutional history to be arrested multiple times both during and after his term.

description.zh-cn: 在2022年总统选举前夕，安哲秀宣布退选，并与尹锡悦合推单一候选人，支持尹锡悦竞选总统。
description.en: On the eve of the 2022 presidential election, Ahn Cheol-soo announced his withdrawal from the race and formed a single candidacy with Yoon Suk Yeol, endorsing Yoon for president.

description.zh-cn: 尹锡悦在总统任期内积极推动改善韩日关系，将日本定位为共享普世价值的合作伙伴。
description.en: During his presidency, Yoon Suk Yeol actively promoted the improvement of South Korea-Japan relations, defining Japan as a partner sharing universal values.

description.zh-cn: 尹锡悦访问日本并与时任首相岸田文雄举行会谈，旨在改善双边关系。
description.en: Yoon Suk Yeol visited Japan and held a summit with then-Prime Minister Fumio Kishida to improve bilateral relations.

description.zh-cn: 尹锡悦在美国进行国事访问期间与美国总统乔·拜登会晤，并在美国国会发表演讲。
description.en: During his state visit to the United States, Yoon Suk Yeol met with US President Joe Biden and delivered a speech to the US Congress.
